com.ibm.caas

Class CAASContentItemRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.caas.CAASRequest<C>
      • com.ibm.caas.CAASContentItemRequest

  • public class CAASContentItemRequest
extends CAASRequest<C>
    A request object for querying details of a single content item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CAASContentItemRequest

        public CAASContentItemRequest(CAASDataCallback<CAASContentItem> callback)
        Initialize this request the specified callback.
        Parameters:
        callback - the callback instance to which the request results will be dispatched asynchronously.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the path of the content item(s) to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the path string.

      • setPath

        public void setPath(java.lang.String path)
        Set the path of the content item(s) to retrieve. The path is mutually exclusive with the oid, therefore this method resets the oid to null.
        Parameters:
        path - the path string.

      • getOid

        public java.lang.String getOid()
        Set the oid of the content item(s) to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the oid string.

      • setOid

        public void setOid(java.lang.String oid)
        Set the oid of the content item(s) to retrieve. The oid is mutually exclusive with the path, therefore this method resets the path to null.
        Parameters:
        oid - the oid string.

      • getProject

        public java.lang.String getProject()
        Get the project scope, if any.

      • setProject

        public void setProject(java.lang.String project)
        Set the project scope.

      • getElements

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getElements()
        Get the elements to be served.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of the elements to be served by this request.

      • addElements

        public void addElements(java.lang.String... elements)
        Only serve the specified elements.

      • getProperties

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProperties()
        Get the properties to be served.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of the properties to be served by this request.

      • addProperties

        public void addProperties(java.lang.String... properties)
        Only serve the specified properties.

        The supported properties are: authtemplateid, authtemplatename, authtemplatetitle, authors, categories, creationdate, creator, currentstage, description, expirydate, id, keywords, lastmodifieddate, lastmodifier, libraryid, libraryname, librarytitle, name, parentid, parentname, parenttitle, projectid, projectname, projecttitle, publishdate, status, statusid, title, contenttype.

      • addParameter

        public void addParameter(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String value)
        Add the specified arbitrary request parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter to add.
        value - the parameter value.
